<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snare Setter](/Feats.aspx?ID=1275) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You are adept at the time-honored kobold art of trap making. You gain the trained proficiency in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4). If you were already trained in Crafting, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain access to all uncommon [kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=224) snares. You gain the [Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843) feat, though when choosing your formulas for that feat, you can also choose from uncommon kobold snares, as well as common snares.
name: Snare Setter
